document.full_text: a new report from the pew environment group on clean energy investment among the world's leading economies finds that the united states has slipped to third place, behind china and germany.
document.title: clean energy investment is up, but u.s. lags
lines_and_colors: a new report from the pew environment group on clean energy investment among the world's leading economies finds that the united states has slipped to third place, behind china and germany.
